subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: With a firm but fair touch, Jim Caldwell has transformed the Lions (10-4), who are tied with the Green Bay Packers atop the N.F.C. North.
snippet: With a firm but fair touch, Jim Caldwell has transformed the Lions (10-4), who are tied with the Green Bay Packers atop the N.F.C. North.
